attributes.action: The Implications of the Rise in University Fees
attributes.additional_details:
We are campaigning in our Citizenship GCSE lesson to receive evidence from people who agree that University Fees are too high, and raising them will not be beneficial towards young people. If you feel that the rise in Tuition fees are unnecessary, please take the time to sign this Petition!

If we receive enough signatures, we would like the Government to see how much of an issue it is and will hopefully pass it on to the members of their team in the Education Department.
